# Velum Core Flutter Bindings
# This directory contains the flutter_rust_bridge generated bindings

# Generated bridge files (auto-generated by flutter_rust_bridge)
lib/
  velum_core.dart        # Main bridge entry point
  velum_core_bindings_generated.dart  # Generated bindings
  velum_core.io.dart     # IO-specific bindings
  velum_core_stub.dart   # Stub for web/platform

# Native libraries
native/
  libvelum_core.so       # Linux shared library
  libvelum_core.dylib    # macOS shared library
  velum_core.dll         # Windows DLL

# Configuration
flutter_rust_builder.yaml  # Bridge generator config
